snippet: Maria Höfl-Riesch of Germany won her second consecutive World Cup downhill, covering the course in Lake Louise, Alberta, in 1:55.09.
abstract: Winter Roundup; Bode Miller of the United States finishes 14th in World Cup Super-G race in Beaver Creek, Colo; other winter sports news noted.
lead_paragraph: Maria Höfl-Riesch of Germany won her second consecutive World Cup downhill, covering the course in Lake Louise, Alberta, in 1:55.09.

headline.main: Höfl-Riesch Wins Downhill to Take Lead in Standings
headline.print_headline: Miller Thrills but Comes Up Short in the Super-G
